title: I left a game but I didn't get leavebuster
body: I left a bot game and I didn't get a 20 minute priority queue. Why?

replies.body:
It doesn't always trigger on the first leave because Riot understands that sometimes emergencies do happen and people need to leave games.[ You usually get a warning](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q1) first.

Ranked is treated differently and the punishments are much more severe, with a higher chance of triggering a LPQ  on the first leave.
But I probably won't get a warning. I'll just get a 20 minute LPQ because I had 10 minutes and 5 minutes before.
if you have a streak of not leaving games then you don't get a priority queue the next time you leave you most likely will get it
